local_intent: Verify the can is held, align to the table, place the red can on the table with low force, and confirm contact.
assumptions: Robot is holding the red can prior to placement
Contact detection correlates with surface contact
coherence_with_global: Implements the transfer/placement phase: checks object in gripper, aligns to table, places with yaw 0 and press_force 5, and verifies contact; matches the GLOBAL_BT ordering preceding open-and-retreat.
